article_title: Gaza death toll rises to 42,603, Hamas-run health ministry says.
sentence: In  its  latest  update,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  84  people  have  been  killed  and  158  others  injured  in  the  past  24  hours.

article_title: Gaza death toll rises to 42,603, Hamas-run health ministry says.
sentence: At  least  42,603  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  99,795  others  injured,  since  Israel  started  its  military  offensive  in  Gaza  since  7  October  last  year,  according  to  the  health  ministry.

article_title: Gaza death toll rises to 42,603, Hamas-run health ministry says.
sentence: On  7  October,  a  Hamas-led  attack  on  Israel  resulted  in  about  1,200  people  being  killed  and  251  taken  hostage.
